articles.author: Valerie Complex
articles.title: Awkwafina Addresses Blaccent And AAVE Criticism; Leaves Twitter - Deadline
articles.description: Awkwafina is leaving Twitter for now.  The actress whose real name is Nora Lum Tweeted release a statement earlier today addressing the criticisms for her use of African American Vernacular English (AAVE). She starts the apology by stating, “There is a sociop…
articles.content:
